structure.unit: RIGHTS OF ACTION AND SURVIVAL OF ACTIONS

text.section: In any civil action where claims for punitive damages are included, the jury or judge if jury trial has been waived, shall determine concurrently with all other issues presented, whether punitive damages may be assessed.
KRS 411.184 and this section are applicable to all cases in which punitive damages are sought.

law.history: Created 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 224, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1988.
